channel.title: Quest Tab Issue
channel.description:
Basically all these actions seen below should be shown on the quest tab. originally it was showing all numbers until i did the attempted fix and now some show. any idea how to fix?
[IMG]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/7752/questg.jpg[/img]
should look like this
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/847859/questtab.png[/img]
my attempted fix was
Under initialize() in client.java add getPA().writeQuestTab();

item.title: Quest Tab Issue
item.dc:creator: @nathanrr44 nathanrr44
item.description:
@nathanrr44 wrote:

Basically all these actions seen below should be shown on the quest tab. originally it was showing all numbers until i did the attempted fix and now some show. any idea how to fix?

should look like this

my attempted fix was

Under initialize() in client.java add
getPA().writeQuestTab();
